com.gilran.chess.android

Class AsyncGetTask<Response>

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.gilran.chess.android.AsyncGetTask<Response>
  • Type Parameters:
    Response - The type of the taks response.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginTask, MoveTask, SeekTask

    public abstract class AsyncGetTask<Response>
extends
    An async task for GET requests to the chess server.
    Author:
    Gil Ran

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AsyncGetTask.Callback<Response>
      A callback for the async task.

    • Field Detail

      • context

        protected Context context
        The android context.

      • service

        protected ChessClientService service
        The chess client service.

      • actionMessage

        private java.lang.String actionMessage
        The action message. This message will be displayed while the get request is active, until a response (or a timeout) is received. May be null, in which case, the user will not get an indiaction while the request is pending.

      • actionError

        private java.lang.String actionError
        The error message that will be displayed in case the request failed.

      • callback

        private AsyncGetTask.Callback<Response> callback
        The callback that will be called with the response.

      • dialog

        private ProgressDialog dialog
        A progress dialog that will be used for the action message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncGetTask

        public AsyncGetTask(Context context,
            ChessClientService service,
            java.lang.String actionMessage,
            java.lang.String actionError,
            AsyncGetTask.Callback<Response> callback)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        context - The android context.
        service - The chess client service.
        actionMessage - The message that will be displayed while the get request is active. If null, no message will be displayed.
        actionError - The error message that will be displayed in case the request failed.
        callback - The callback that will be called with the response.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        protected abstract Response run()
        The actual work that needs to be done for this task. This method is called from doInBackground, and should use the service in order to make do a GET from the server.

        protected void onPreExecute()

      • doInBackground

        protected Response doInBackground(java.lang.Void... params)
